creditline: Gift of Harriet and Ed Spencer
description: parts of body of dragon visible behind clouds; open mouth at UL; gold and blue brocade borders
dimension:
42 3/16 x 16 3/16 in. (107.16 x 41.12 cm) (image)
75 3/4 x 21 1/2 in. (192.41 x 54.61 cm) (overall, without roller)
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a pair
signed: LRC: 連山岸文進 {Renzan Kishi Bunshin}
text: This pair of hanging scrolls is the product of a collaboration between two related Kyoto artists. The tiger is by Ganku and the dragon by his son-in-law and principal student, Kishi Renzan.
title: Dragon [right of a pair of Tiger and Dragon]
